body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Stellar Hotels Customer Support. My name is Roy Foster. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Maria Sanders.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Maria. How can I assist you today? I understand there is an issue regarding privacy at the hotel. Could you provide me with your date of birth in the format of d zero zero m zero y zero zero zero zero?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is zero one d zero five m zero eight y one nine eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Maria. And for security purposes, I'll also need the last four digits of your phone number. Could you provide that information, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, the last four digits of my phone number are two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information. We are committed to resolving this privacy issue promptly. Is there anything else you would like to share, Maria?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, those are the main concerns I have regarding privacy at your hotel.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, Maria. We take your feedback seriously and will address this matter with urgency. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. Your time and patience are greatly appreciated. Have a wonderful day!
